Welcome to the ALOHA Lab

The ALOHA (Advanced Language Processing and Human Analytics) Lab conducts transformative research in various areas of NLP and AI. We leverage expertise in natural language understanding, generative AI, summarization, and large language model (LLM) applications. We are housed in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii Manoa.

ðŸ”¥ We are looking for self-motivated new PhD, Master, undergraduate students, and research interns to join the lab.

    • Information Retrieval

    • Multi-modal foundation models
  • NLP4Science
